## BaseExtensionProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseExtensionProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./react.baseextensionprops.children.md) | <code>never</code> |  |
|  [priority](./react.baseextensionprops.priority.md) | <code>number</code> | Sets the priority for the extension. Lower number means the extension is loaded first and gives it priority. <code>-1</code> is loaded before <code>0</code> and will overwrite any conflicting configuration.<!-- -->Base extensions are loaded with a priority of 1. |
